Reviews.Title: Nice mid-line camera
Reviews.Author: Kohn Sutton Sr
Reviews.Content: This camera performs better than some in the $200-$300 range. And the functions are pretty standard so it was easy for me to buy it and start using it within minutes!

Reviews.Title: You won't go wrong with this Fujifilm camera.
Reviews.Author: Vince
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my wife for Christmas, the one she had was like a toy compered to this camera. She is taking better quality pictures with this one.  Consumers Report had Fujifilm  camera's in there report as one of the best to buy. I looked at the others but I settled for this one. Yes, I would recommend this Fujifilm camera to my friends and who ever ask me I would tell them it's worth the money.

Reviews.Title: idiot-proof, with very good image quality
Reviews.Author: Walter Dees
Reviews.Content: I know almost nothing about photography but this camera lets me take high quality photos inside or out. If you want a simple camera with some advanced features, that performs well and is easy to use, this is the one!

Reviews.Title: Camera comes with a Viewfinder and LCD panel for a bargain price
Reviews.Author: Major Hardtime
Reviews.Content: Purchased this camera from Walmart on 4 January 2014 for $99.  This camera has a 28X Optical zoom lens.  It takes four AA batteries, so that is a plus.  Camera comes with a Viewfinder and LCD panel.  It takes great daytime photos, but handheld night shots are a bit blurry.  Planning on purchasing a mono-pod to help reduce shaking.  The camera offers manual and automatic settings, plus a pop-up flash.  The camera looks nice too.  It would be nice if Fujifilm would produce some instructional videos to help purchasers get up to speed with some the camera's advanced features..  I was snapping pictures within minutes of opening the box.  If you want a great all around camera for a bargain price, then purchase one of these.

Reviews.Title: I just bought this in walmart for $99
Reviews.Author: shawna
Reviews.Content: It works pretty well,  I don't know much about cameras but it gets the job done & comes with a lanyard type thing, chords to hook it up to the tv or computer, batteries, and a camera lense. I kind of love it (:

ProductInfo.Features:
14 Megapixel Resolution with High-Quality Still Images & Video Recordings
Featuring Motion Panorama Effects & SR Auto Automatic Scene Recognition
Zoom Lens with 28x Optical Zoom
3" Color EVF LCD screen with image editing features
Featuring Brightness Adjustment, Graphical User Interface, easy-to-read menu system,
ProductInfo.Name: Fujifilm FinePix S4430
